shortcv.p: Konstantinos Stroggylos is a PhD Candidate at the Athens University of Economics and Business (AUEB), Department of Management Science and Technology. He holds a BSc in Informatics and a MSc in Information Systems, both from Athens University of Economics and Business.

In the past he has worked in IT support&consulting and software development positions during his studies. He is a member of the SENSE group. His research interests include programming languages and Software Engineering (specifically software quality, refactoring and Design Patterns).

phd-info.phd-title: Automated refactoring of legacy source code and its effect on software quality
